item.title: How stablecoins quietly beat bitcoin at its own game

item.title: 3 Virginia sheriff's deputies who were injured in gunfire while executing a search warrant are OK
item.description: Three sheriff's deputies injured in gunfire at Wednesday while executing warrants in southern Virginia were shaken up but are “OK."
